title: gift from a friend
body:
friend of mine bought me a gift skin i think and when i opened the box nothing... cant fine "purchase" history or any other way to find what i got
help please the friend wants to know what i got XD 
thanks to all the helpers

replies.body: Your purchase history is an option available in the client through the store.  It will have it's own section for gifts.  Looking into this for you, it look like your friend gifted Commando Galio.  Grats!
His friend is not a good person it turns out.
